name: GitTagExtractor
description: Extracts Git tags from commits. Will either return all tags in a semi-colon separated list, or the first found tag that matches the semantic version format X.X.X. Defaults to using the latest commit if no commit SHA is provided.
author: Matthew de Beer

inputs.name: outputOptions
inputs.label: Output options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select whether to extract a semi-colon separated list of all tags, or just the semantic version tag.

options.SemVerOnly: Extract the first semantic version tag

inputs.name: commitSha
inputs.label: Short commit SHA
inputs.helpMarkDown: The short commit SHA to check for tags. If left empty, the most recent commit will be checked.
